name: Eisen and the Slime Dungeon
description:
Eisen is a human hero who mysteriously woke up in an unknown dungeon. You play said hero and try to escape from this top-down 2D dungeon which has (many) threats, a strange voice guiding you and even some secrets to find in it.

Some (probably all) of the features are:
  • Three different voices, the character you play, a kind of guide and a secret which offers information to the secret of this world, all fully voice-lined in English and with English subtitles. All of this should make you feel more comfortable to play this game.
  • Nearly every soundtrack is self-made music, specially composed for this game.
  • Astonishing particle effects and intense sound effects.
  • Two hidden secrets: An additional music track as memento from the creator of the sound and a pretty hard to find voice line to uncover some of the truths of the “guide”.
  • In the end of this game an (not so) epic Boss fight awaits you.

 

 

You can control the character with the following keys: W=move upward
A=move to the left
S=move downward
D=move to the right
J=attack in the direction you are facing
ESC=pause the game

After downloading you need to unzip the ".rar" package and start the "EiseAndTheSlimeDungeon.exe" to play and enjoy this game.
